---
title: "brand.yml and ggplot"
---

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 4

library(tidyverse)
library(brand.yml)
library(quarto)

ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = drv)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(title = "A plot") +
  theme_minimal()
```
